title: The Root Schema
description: The root schema comprises the entire JSON document.

policy_id.title: The Policy_id Schema
policy_id.description: A unique identifier for a policy

transaction_id.title: The Transaction_id Schema
transaction_id.description: A unique identifier for this policy transaction

quote_id.title: The Quote_id Schema
quote_id.description: A unique identifier for this version of the quote

period_number.title: The Period_number Schema
period_number.description: The policy period this transaction occured within.

transaction_type.title: The Transaction_type Schema
transaction_type.description: The type of transaction that occured

transaction_lines.title: The Transaction_lines Schema
transaction_lines.description: A line of insurance cover that has been charged/refunded to the customer.

items.title: The Transaction Lines schema
items.description: A object describing the lines of insurance being charged/refunded.

cover_code.title: The Cover_code Schema
cover_code.description: A code that describes the line of cover

transaction_premium.title: The Transaction_premium Schema
transaction_premium.description: The total premium due for this line of cover on this transaction

transaction_premium_tax.title: The Transaction_premium_tax Schema
transaction_premium_tax.description: The total Insurance Premium Tax due for this line of cover on this transaction

agency_commission.title: The Agency_commission Schema
agency_commission.description: The Commission to be kept by Wrisk and it's distribution partner for this transaction

sum_insured.title: The Sum_insured Schema
sum_insured.description: The amount insured on this transaction - Not applicable to car insurance.

excess.title: The Excess Schema
excess.description: The customers' excess for this line of cover.

cover_period_start.title: The Cover_period_start Schema
cover_period_start.description: The start of the period in which the transaction was created

risk_factors.title: The Risk_factors Schema
risk_factors.description: An array that describes the factors which are used to price the insurance risk.

factor_code.title: The Factor_code Schema
factor_code.description: The key for any given risk factor.

factor_level_code.title: The Factor_level_code Schema
factor_level_code.description: The value for any given risk factor.

asset.title: The Asset Schema
asset.description: An object that describes an insurable asset and it's relationship to the insured.

id.title: The Id Schema
id.description: A unique identifier for the version of the asset.

code.title: The Code Schema
code.description: A unique idenitifer for the asset over it's lifetime.

user_id.title: The User_id Schema
user_id.description: The user id of which the asset belongs to.

data.title: The Data Schema
data.description: An object that describes the asset and it's relationship to the user.

usage.title: The Usage Schema
usage.description: The type of usage for a vehicle

legalOwner.title: The Legalowner Schema
legalOwner.description: The legal owner of the vehicle

racBlackBox.title: The Racblackbox Schema
racBlackBox.description: Whether the vehicle has an RAC Black Box installed

annualMileage.title: The Annualmileage Schema
annualMileage.description: The estimated annual mileage the customer input for this vehicle.

fuel.title: The Fuel Schema
fuel.description: The Fuel type of the vehicle.

year.title: The Year Schema
year.description: The year the vehicle was manufactured

model.title: The Model Schema
model.description: The model variant of the vehicle.

value.title: The Value Schema
value.description: The estimated value of the vehicle.

steering.title: The Steering Schema
steering.description: The steering configuration of the vehicle

licencePlate.title: The Licenceplate Schema
licencePlate.description: The Reg Plate of the vehicle

numberOfSeats.title: The Numberofseats Schema
numberOfSeats.description: The number of seats fitted in the vehicle.

insuranceGroup.title: The Insurancegroup Schema
insuranceGroup.description: The Thatcham Insurance Group for the vehicle.

noClaimsDiscount.title: The Noclaimsdiscount Schema
noClaimsDiscount.description: The customers No Claims Discount applied to this vehicle.

registeredKeeper.title: The Registeredkeeper Schema
registeredKeeper.description: The registered keeper of the vehicle.

overnightLocation.title: The Overnightlocation Schema
overnightLocation.description: The location the vehicle is kept ovenight.

specificationTimestamp.title: The Specificationtimestamp Schema
specificationTimestamp.description: The date the specification was requested from the vehicle search provider.

created_at.title: The Created_at Schema
created_at.description: The datetime the asset version was created.

profile.title: The Profile Schema
profile.description: An object that describes the customer.
